capsules_submitted.utterance: So Harry's lineage is indeed from a pure-blood wizard family. I find it interesting that his heritage has been a topic of discussion in the wizarding world. It seems to me that this aspect of his background adds complexity to his story and raises questions about the nature of power and privilege within the magical community.
capsules_submitted.reply: i am glad to have learned something new. i've never heard of a pure blood wizard before, valeria   that's fascinating! what can you tell me about them?

capsules_submitted.utterance: Neville's lineage is indeed quite impressive. I mean, being a pure-blood wizard from the famous Black family is no small feat. He's got a rich history and a strong magical heritage that can't be denied.
capsules_submitted.reply: if you don't mind me asking. valeria, what kind of person is a pure blood wizard?

capsules_submitted.utterance: So Flitwick is a female. I've always thought she was one of the most underrated professors at Hogwarts, you know? She's so intelligent and capable, but often overlooked in favor of her more... flashy colleagues. Anyway, it's good to see that we can confirm some facts about our beloved wizarding world!
capsules_submitted.reply: let me ask you something. what are flitwick's abilities?

capsules_submitted.utterance: So Vernon is the supervisor of the title company. I can confirm that's correct.
capsules_submitted.reply: exciting news! i've never heard of a company supervisor before, valeria, can you tell me more about what that is?

capsules_submitted.utterance: So Vernon is the supervisor of the title company. I can confirm that, and I'm certain about it.

capsules_submitted.utterance: So Harry's affiliation is indeed Hogwarts. I'm quite certain about that, and it's a fact that's widely known. It's not surprising to me that you'd agree with me on this one.
